product_name: Coghlan's Hard Anodized Cook Set - Special Buy
long_description: Compact and lightweight for group camping or backpacking, the Coghlan's Hard Anodized Cook Set features 3 nesting pots with lids, a frying pan and more. Includes: 7.8 in. x 2 in. frying pan, 2.7 liter pot with lid, 1.7 liter pot with lid, 1 liter pot with lid, bamboo-fiber potscrubber, plastic measuring cup, nylon carry bag. Hard-anodized aluminum cookware is durable, cooks evenly, and is stick-resistant, though not nonstick. Features swing-out handles on each pot and pan. Coghlan's Hard Anodized Cook Set easily nests together for compact storage. Recommended for use only on a camp stove, not a campfire. Keep handles away from direct contact with flame or intense heat; wash pot set only by hand. Special buy.
short_description: Compact and lightweight for group camping or backpacking, the Coghlan's Hard Anodized Cook Set features 3 nesting pots with lids, a frying pan and more.
